about_the_game:
Consortium’s Fall is a sci-fi roguelite twin-stick shooter about a lone hero’s fight against his people’s oppressor. Infiltrate the three bases of the Stellar Consortium, fight the grunts and bosses that guard them, growing stronger with upgrades and weapons you pick up along the way - all while uncovering knowledge and secrets of long gone past. With every new run, you will master the very elements the enemy seeks to exploit. Bring about the Consortium’s fall, no matter what it takes.

You are Zyx, a Cilian scholar compelled to infiltrate the tyrannical Stellar Consortium in the name of his people and home planet, Zolareus. Zolareus is home to an abundance of Eternum, a powerful component the Consortium uses in their relentless pursuit of galactic dominance. If nothing is done, the Stellar Consortium will suck Zolareus dry and secure your people as one of their pawns.

Will you persevere and fight back, before it’s too late? On your journey throughout the enemy’s territory, you will encounter mysterious pillars with messages from ancient times. Decode their scripture to gain better understanding, and uncover knowledge that will help you in your rebellion!
